vulnerable.special: Any damage aimed specifically at its head (23 AC)

trait.name: Quickness (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The licker can take an extra action on its turn.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The licker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The licker makes two tongue attacks.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 4d4 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the licker can't use its tongue on another target. If this attack is a critical hit, the target also can't breathe or speak until the grapple ends.

The licker is a special kind of undead, where its brain has outgrown its skull, destroying its eyes in the process. It primarily attacks with its prehensile tongue, climbing on walls or ceilings to reach its targets.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hunter makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Leap
entries: The hunter leaps at a target within 30 feet, moving within 5 feet of them and making one claw attack.
The hunter is a heavily armored undead, specializing in dealing high damage. It is known to leap at its targets, dealing a devastating blow in the process.

monster.name: Tyrant
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The tyrant is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The tyrant's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Unkillable
entries: When the tyrant reaches 0 hit points, it does not die. At this point, the tyrant will die if it takes 63 damage in a single player's turn.

trait.name: Top Heavy
entries: If the tyrant takes 42 damage on a single player's turn, it will be {@condition stunned} during its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tyrant makes two melee attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Siege Break
entries: The tyrant breaks through a stone wall 5 feet thick or smaller, putting them on the other side of the wall.
